mapper.insert:
select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review (review_id, review_title, review_person, review_date, review_content) values (${Review.review_id}, #{Review.review_title}, #{Review.review_person}, to_date(#{Review.review_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{Review.review_content})
mapper.select: select * from review order by review_id desc
mapper.update: update review set view_cnt = ${view_cnt} + 1 where review_id = ${review_id}
